conbody.p: MapR FS File Metadata executorchanging metadataYou can configure the MapR FS File Metadata executor to change the metadata for a file in MapR FS after receiving an event. You might use the executor to change metadata after a destination closes a file.

When changing file metadata, the MapR FS File Metadata executor can change the following file metadata at the same time:
File name
File location
File owner and group
File permissions
Access control lists (ACLs)
When changing metadata, the user who impersonates the HDFS user must have the necessary permissions to perform the task. For more information about the HDFS user, see .
